Samy Jaziri is PRAG IUT Orsay. Adrien Koutsos is a post-doc, MPI (Saarbrücken). Anthony Lick is professeur CPGE Guillaume Bury is at OcamlPro Yann Duplouy is a post-doc, LORIA (Nancy). Alexandre Vigny is a post-doctoral researcher, Warsaw. Nathan Grosshans is a ATER, ENS Paris. Engel Lefaucheux is a post-doc, MPI (Saarbrücken). Simon Halfon is a ATER, ENS Paris-Saclay.
